channel.title: MASSIVE PVP ;) BATTLE SERVER - all pvp, items, staffzone, pvp free arera!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]The new... the improved[/size][/center]

The server is now - 24/7, no lag, no downtime!

[size=24pt][center]Battlescape2000 Massive online PVP battle server!![/center][/size] So your probely thinking... What is soo good about this server?!? Battlescape2000 is a PVP battle server that allows users to battle other players "whenever" and "wherever" they would like. Even if the player doesnt want a battle!! Some commonly asked questions are bellow: [b][i]How do you make money?[/i][/b] The answer to this question is simple. When you make your account you start off with around 24mill. Some people think..thats not much. Well 24mill in Battlescape2000 = about 10-12Bill when put up against other servers. This is because ITEM prices are Much Much Much less than other private servers. For example: A abassyle Whip averages 10 - 25mill on other private servers.. on battlescape2000 [b]Abassyle Whips are only 60k!![/b] Here are the pictures!!! Battle Area. [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/qvzzro61idsomk.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/9uxrmkzxhrb5ct3.jpg[/img] Design what you look like!! [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/xgb4xju3eofhid.jpg[/img] Interactive Battles [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/jv8lhzjnqq67px.jpg[/img] Cool Armour! [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/pidvqe1g7qtn89f.jpg[/img] Inventory and Mini Map. [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/ttmi9z3rp12kl6c.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/tow8y0dj64vjvw.jpg[/img] PVP shop - Play with Coins [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/t2l3ipi7ckqq5o.jpg[/img] Mage Shop. [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/setfpp4kll6m0p0.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/q2a9v952ixrptl4.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/2xw3p1zgujden9.jpg[/img] teleporter [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/g43k0l74z2z6s4i.jpg[/img] Varrock [img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/jb6i19f78c4zoh2.jpg[/img] DOWNLOAD SOURCE LINK - http://www.mediafire.com/?ghjzkzzfjjn

@MobilScape wrote:

[center][size=18pt]The new… the improved[/size][/center]

The server is now - 24/7, no lag, no downtime!

[size=24pt][center]Battlescape2000 Massive online PVP battle server!![/center][/size] So your probely thinking... What is soo good about this server?!?

Battlescape2000 is a PVP battle server that allows users to battle other players “whenever” and “wherever” they would like. Even if the player doesnt want a battle!!

Some commonly asked questions are bellow:

How do you make money?
The answer to this question is simple. When you make your account you start off with around 24mill. Some people think…thats not much. Well 24mill in Battlescape2000 = about 10-12Bill when put up against other servers. This is because ITEM prices are Much Much Much less than other private servers. For example: A abassyle Whip averages 10 - 25mill on other private servers… on battlescape2000 Abassyle Whips are only 60k!!
